ACTION: If Urth is not already in sight, Urth moves to Mister Eisenfeldt's side, turns into his werewolf form, and attacks.
CONDITION: Player initiates. Urth is alive. Urth is in his human form. Urth does not have his ring. Mister Eisenfeldt has either already given out a reward OR the player does not have Urth's ring.
CONDITION: Player initiates. Urth is alive. Urth is in his human form. Player has Urth's ring. Mister Eisenfeldt has not yet given out a reward.
ACTION: Give 150 gp to the player.
